To meet the needs of
hospital E hospital residents, the Ministry of Health has just received
treatment for a male patient admitted to the hospital
with severe abdominal pain
suspected of having kidney stones. But after examining
Doctors examined the patient and discovered that the patient had up to
four kidneys in the body. According to the
doctors, the patient having three to four
kidneys is a rare congenital defect and is due to
abnormal development of the ureteral bud
during embryogenesis.  The fetus forms and
develops normally. The ureteral bud
develops into two kidneys and
normal people only have two kidneys.
However, there are a few people who
instead of developing into two kidneys, one ureteral bud
develops into four kidneys.  Miraculous results
like the case of the above male patient are
very rare until now. World Medical Literature has
